title: The $0 Apple Update That Changes Music Forever
description: Apple Music Spatial Audio + Atmos & Losless Review! Apples iOS 14.6 Apple Music update that gets better with iOS 15 changes music forever. It brings Lossless, hi-res lossless & Dolby atmos music with spatial audio for $0 extra. This is my full breakdown/walkthrough and how to listen in lossless.   Recorded and mixed on M1 iPad Pro:   My Dolby Atmos + Spatial Audio playlist!   Listen to MagSafe in Apple Lossless:  Listen to MagSafe on Spotify:   Young Morales by Jonathan & Friends ft Wolf Apple Music:  Spotify:   Apple Music Lossless Guide:  Mixing in Dolby Atmos by Dave Way & Produce Like a Pro:   Morgan Freeman by Josh Robert Thompson:   Joshua Valour:  Darko Audio:   Dragonfly black (youll need a lightning to USB or USB C to USB adapter)    Dragonfly Red:    Dragonfly Cobalt:     Beyerdynamic DT 1990 Pro:   RME Babyface Pro:
